import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Layout } from 'antd' import PubSub from 'pubsub-js' const { Content } = Layout export default class User extends Component { state = { user: null } componentDidMount() { PubSub.subscribe('showUserInfo', (msg, user) => this.setState({ user })) } render() { const { user } = this.state return (
